biography: Tomas, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée from Espoo Ringside Golf, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. While Tomas has not secured a victory at the Hector Trophée, his presence has always been marked by a competitive spirit.

Having participated in 3 previous Hector Trophée tournaments, Tomas's strategic play and dedication to the sport have earned him respect among his peers. Known for his calm demeanor on the course, Tomas approaches each shot with careful calculation.

It is believed that Tomas has retired from the Hector Trophée circuit, so he will likely not be participating in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. However, in the world of golf, surprises can always happen.
